data.title: ALWAYS A GREAT TIME AT THE BIG BANG  !!!
data.text: The live music and the dueling pianos sets the stage for a fun time.  My wife and I always have a blast.  Always meet new friends and have so much fun, especially later in the evening when the dueling pianos get a bit more risque - we love it !.  Get there early and you have no cover and the drinks are less as well.  Later in the evening there is more dancing which adds even more fun on the dance floor.  Love to listen to songs from the 50's, 60's, 70's, 80's as well as the current music for the college age kids.  Love it all !

data.title: An absolute blast!!
data.text: Anytime I have visitors from out-of-town, we take them to the Big Bang for a great time. My friends and I go a few times a year as well. The Big Bang is always a great time. The performers are talented and make the experience so much fun! This place is great for a group gathering too!!

data.title: Best Bar on Mill
data.text: Fun spot for some live music and dueling pianos. Friendly staff, great place to dance and have some drinks, better then your average bar.  Great drink deals and wonder atmosphere.

data.title: Great Bar
data.text:
Hi
We visited this bar recently and had a really enjoyable night. Great live music and excellent friendly bar staff

data.title: Always a fun time!
data.text: I'm going to keep this review simple. Big Bang is always a fun time and constantly delivers on great music The atmosphere is fantastic and you'll always leave having made a new friend and having sung some old tunes! Go after 10pm for the best crowd!

data.title: Very loud, raunchy and fun.
data.text:
Get here early to get a seat down front if you want the ultimate enjoyment. Although they have screen up for folks in the back to see the action it is better down front. They rotate piano players in and out so there are always different personalities to deal with. 

They do not serve food so we always order pizza from Slice's or Corleone's and get it delivered or bring it in with us. 

Hell of a great night out for some adult time.

data.title: Not the most entertaining, but still can be a good time
data.text: This place is a dueling piano bar, and I can't say I was that impressed by it. The drinks are a little overpriced, there is a cover charge to get in (although not surprising since there is live entertainment), but the dueling pianists usually play the same songs each time and I doubt they ever play the songs requested on the little sheets of paper. I do not enjoy going to this place unless I've had a LOT to drink since the music is very cheesy.

data.title: Too much fun!
data.text: Dueling pianos. Beer in plastic cups. The most fun I've had in Tempe!

data.title: Not a restaurant
data.text: This is hard review to write as it really doesn't fit in any category.  Firstly, this is not a restaurant.  We were there on a Friday night and there was no food at all.  Drinks are served in thin plastic cups.  One would think that being so close to ASU that it would be a student hang out.  It doesn't appear to be that.  The night we went, there were very few students and the average age was between 30 and 60.  The entertainers are very talented.  I think it's the luck of the draw as to whether or not the group you get does a nice job or not.  Our entertainers were a bit rowdy and some things were inappropriate.  It wasn't like a normal bar where people hang out, drink and talk.  This appears to be a bar where people drink way too much in order to get up enough nerve to participate in the entertainment.  It's LOUD; even the dual pianos are amplified.  It was fun to an extent.

data.title: Fun piano bar, bar food...
data.text: Fun piano bar, bar food overall a cool place especially for the college environment, drinks are good, and great times!  Only thing is that they need to mix their act up once you go a couple times you see the same show and same songs!
